name: Cantaloupe Cayenne Sorbet
author: Chef John
summary: Here's my version of this delicious sorbet from Humphry Slocombe, one of San Francisco's top ice cream makers. The vodka in this is optional, but I think it helps create a smoother texture.
ingredients: 1 ½ tablespoons seasoned rice wine vinegar
¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
directions: Place melon in bowl of a blender
Add sugar, vodka, rice vinegar, lime juice, and cayenne pepper
Blend on highest speed to completely liquefy, 1 or 2 minutes
Pour into ice cream maker and proceed according to manufacturer's instructions
Smooth out surface and cover with plastic wrap
Freeze until firm, at least 5 hours
